title: Best Google Pixel Tablet screen protectors in 2025
description: Keep your Google Pixel Tablet display safe with these best screen protectors. The post Best Google Pixel Tablet screen protectors in 2025 appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Ajit Singh
excerpt: Keep your Google Pixel Tablet display safe with these best screen protectors.
text: The Google Pixel Tablet sports an 11-inch IPS LCD display with a 1600 x 2560 pixels resolution. This panel offers a 16:10 aspect ratio and 276 pixel density. It is an ideal display for different purposes like watching content, reading books/web articles, playing games, and even productivity. The stylus support is also there for those who love to draw/doodle. Google has not shared the display protection used for the tablet. Nevertheless, you should invest in a good-quality screen protector. It will ensure the display stays protected from scratches, smudges, and other damage. Here are the best Google Pixel Tablet screen protectors in 2025. Spigen GlasTR EZ Fit Screen Protector This is Spigen's tempered glass screen protector with 9H rated hardness. It is slightly on the expensive side. It comes with the EZ fit tray and alignment film that helps with hassle-free installation. The oleophobic coating will keep fingerprints away. Sale JETech Screen Protector (2-pack) This is an affordable screen protector who do not want to go for something expensive. It offers a perfect fit for the iPhone and complete coverage. You get two screen protectors with the package. Sale amFilm Screen Protector It is an anti-scratch 9H tempered glass screen protector for superior durability. There is an oleophobic coating to keep fingerprints and smudges away. The packages also feature micro-fiber cleaning cloth and plastic squeeze card. Sale Supershieldz Screen Protector (2-pack) This is a tempered glass screen protector with 9H rated hardness and 2.5D rounded edges. It has a hydrophobic and oleophobic coating to reduce sweat and fingerprints. It also has rainbow-effect-proof properties. There are two screen protectors in the package. ArmorSuit Screen Protector (2-pack) It is a thin film screen protector made of scratch-proof, ultra-tough, clear, and yellow-resistant material. Self-repair tech takes care of minor scratches. You get two screen protectors, installation spray, squeegee, and a microfiber cloth with the package. Ivoler Screen Protector (2-pack) This ivoler screen protector has 9H rated hardness and 0.33mm thickness. It has an anti-fingerprint coating to keep the display clean. You get two screen protectors with the package. Note: This article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running. Ajit is a freelance tech reporter who loves everything tech but has a soft corner for Android. He started his stint in tech journalism in 2015 and has previously worked with publications like Digit India and Android Headlines. You can also find his work on MySmartPrice. html:
The Google Pixel Tablet sports an 11-inch IPS LCD display with a 1600 x 2560 pixels resolution. This panel offers a 16:10 aspect ratio and 276 pixel density. It is an ideal display for different purposes like watching content, reading books/web articles, playing games, and even productivity. The stylus support is also there for those who love to draw/doodle.

Google has not shared the display protection used for the tablet. Nevertheless, you should invest in a good-quality screen protector. It will ensure the display stays protected from scratches, smudges, and other damage. Here are the best Google Pixel Tablet screen protectors in 2025.

Spigen GlasTR EZ Fit Screen Protector

This is Spigen's tempered glass screen protector with 9H rated hardness. It is slightly on the expensive side. It comes with the EZ fit tray and alignment film that helps with hassle-free installation. The oleophobic coating will keep fingerprints away.

Sale

JETech Screen Protector (2-pack)

This is an affordable screen protector who do not want to go for something expensive. It offers a perfect fit for the iPhone and complete coverage. You get two screen protectors with the package.

Sale

amFilm Screen Protector

It is an anti-scratch 9H tempered glass screen protector for superior durability. There is an oleophobic coating to keep fingerprints and smudges away. The packages also feature micro-fiber cleaning cloth and plastic squeeze card.

Sale

Supershieldz Screen Protector (2-pack)

This is a tempered glass screen protector with 9H rated hardness and 2.5D rounded edges. It has a hydrophobic and oleophobic coating to reduce sweat and fingerprints. It also has rainbow-effect-proof properties. There are two screen protectors in the package.

ArmorSuit Screen Protector (2-pack)

It is a thin film screen protector made of scratch-proof, ultra-tough, clear, and yellow-resistant material. Self-repair tech takes care of minor scratches. You get two screen protectors, installation spray, squeegee, and a microfiber cloth with the package.

Ivoler Screen Protector (2-pack)

This ivoler screen protector has 9H rated hardness and 0.33mm thickness. It has an anti-fingerprint coating to keep the display clean. You get two screen protectors with the package.
